channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A year after the killing of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO, Luigi Mangione fights to suppress key evidence
item.description: Officers played footage of them catching Mangione, trying to play it cool by chatting about his steak sandwich.

item.description: The World Health Organization conditionally recommended GLP-1 drugs for obesity. A physician breaks down what you need to know about this historic ann...

item.title: Ford CEO hails Trump fuel standards reset as a 'victory' for affordability and common sense
item.description: New fuel economy standards under Trump will help automakers build what Americans want: affordable vehicles instead of expensive electric cars for cons...

item.title: Garmin InReach Mini 3 Offers Fenix 8 Pro Features For Less
item.description: Garmin has released a new range of satellite communicator, headed up by the Garmin inReach Mini 3 will support for photos and voice notes.

item.title: Meet Luana Lopes Lara: The 29-year-old ballerina spent summers working for Ray Dalio—now she’s the youngest female self-made billionaire

item.title: US sawmills warn of accelerating closures as tariffs, weak demand squeeze industry
item.description: U.S. sawmills say tariffs, shrinking export markets and competition from cheaper wood alternatives are driving a surge in closures that threatens the ...

item.title: Small businesses lead November job losses as tariff uncertainty weighs on hiring
item.description: Small businesses lost 120,000 jobs in November amid heightened economic uncertainty over tariffs and outpaced job gains at larger firms, according to ...

item.title: Australia wants to end the era of kids on social media with international ban hailed as ‘first domino’ in global movement
item.description: If Meta, Google, and others can't figure out how to block accounts of users under 16 years old, they'll be fined $33 million per breach.

item.title: ‘Destiny 2: Renegades’ Review: Let The Past Die
item.description: Destiny 2's new Renegades expansion is out, heavily influenced by Star Wars. Is it the entry Destiny 2 needs in this troubled era of the game?

item.title: ‘I don’t know how people are going to live’: ACA enrollees brace for massive premium hikes as subsidies expire
item.description: “I don’t know how people are going to live, with it already being a struggle just to pay for food and all the other things,” Patricia Roberts, 52, sai...

item.title: Crypto Crime — Tortured And Burned Alive For A Password
item.description: When your password costs you your life. Cybercrime turns physical as crypto wrench attack victim pays the ultimate price.

item.title: Scarlett Johansson’s Potential Role In ‘The Batman Part II’ Is Baffling
item.description: Scarlett Johansson is on the verge of joining The Batman Part II, but even with so many characters, it seems very hard to parse who she'd be.

item.title: Steve Cropper, legendary guitarist on Memphis classics from ‘Green Onions’ to ‘In the Midnight Hour,’ dies at 84
item.description: Comedy fans know him as a key part of the Blues Brothers band, but almost everyone knows his understated style from dozens of soul classics.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
